definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, abbr. to 中共中央[Zhong1 Gong4 Zhong1 yang1]
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Gong4 chan3 dang3 Zhong1 yang1 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
containing_words.word: 中國共產黨中央委員會

definition: Propaganda Department of the Communist Party of China
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Gong4 chan3 dang3 Zhong1 yang1 Wei3 yuan2 hui4 Xuan1 chuan2 bu4
containing_words.word: 中國共產黨中央委員會宣傳部

sentences.english: The people throughout the country must rally around the Party' Central Committee.
sentences.chinese: 全國人民必須團結在黨中央的周圍。

sentences.english: Building harmonic society is the objective of a struggle for the Party.
sentences.chinese: 構建合諧社會，是黨中央提出的奮鬥目標。

sentences.english: All the three leading groups of CPC pay great attention to the position and role of the Corps.
sentences.chinese: 黨中央三代領導集體都十分重視兵團的地位和作用。

sentences.english: Ten years ago, Chinese Party central committee made the decision of western development.
sentences.chinese: 十年前，黨中央作出實施西部大開發的戰略決策。

sentences.english: The (place of) Central Committee of the Party was then in Baoan.
sentences.chinese: 那時候黨中央的所在地就在保安。

sentences.english: The Party C tral Committee believes this is a correct decision.
sentences.chinese: 黨中央認爲這個決定是正確的。

definition: Military Commission of the Communist Party Central Committee
United Front (either of the two alliances between the Guomindang and the Communist Party, 1923-1927 and 1937-1945)
commander-in-chief/top military commander for a country or theater of operations
to ask sb to resign from a post
party affairs/work within the Communist party
Communist International or Comintern (1919-1943), also known as the Third International 第三國際|第三国际[Di4 san1 Guo2 ji4]
